channel.title: Thinking About Racing Locally
channel.description:
I've been thinking about picking up a hobby and I was having a discussion with one of my stepdads friends and we came to the conclusion that racing with the modified division at our local speedway would be a really, really cool long term project/hobby. My question is, do we have any racers here? Either charger (front wheel drive), grand national, modified, or super modified? Tell me about it.
A few pics of the modified divison: (I'm not in any of them and I own none of the cars)
[img]http://tylershullickracing.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/Photo0190.jpg[/img]
^ this driver is 17 years old. Badass car, omg. Won a 50 lap feature last week. Murica'!
[img]http://neoracingnews.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/NEORN_SanduskySpeedway_5.26.13_EDITED-178-of-209.jpg[/img]
Cool crash @ 6:15 vvvvvvv
(Gunter get's loose and someone else goes airborne, could only imagine.)
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sb63Ms58kfM[/youtube]

item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I play iRacing and won $5k a few months ago. You should check it out.
